sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM), where a total of 22,078 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 2.2 million underlying shares.
That amounts to about 42.7% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month of 5.2 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $150 strike call option expiring September 21, 2018 , with 1,718 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 171,800 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $150 strike highlighted in orange:

IHS Markit Ltd (Symbol: INFO) options are showing a volume of 5,302 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 530,200 underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 42.3% of INFO's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $55 strike call option expiring October 19, 2018 , with 3,502 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 350,200 underlying shares of INFO.

Below is a chart showing INFO's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $55 strike highlighted in orange:

And TiVo Corp (Symbol: TIVO) saw options trading volume of 4,154 contracts, representing approximately 415,400 underlying shares or approximately 41.9% of TIVO's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 991,000 shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $14 strike call option expiring October 19, 2018 , with 2,013 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 201,300 underlying shares of TIVO.

Below is a chart showing TIVO's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $14 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for CRM options , INFO options , or TIVO options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
